alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 5:03PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Aitkin, northwestern Pine and Carlton Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 502 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McGrath, or 19 miles northwest of Hinckley, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Willow River around 520 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kettle River, Moose Lake and Barnum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin
